=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Buy HDFC Life Insurance Company; target of Rs 739: ICICI Securities
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 06:35
Related Stocks: HDFC, RELIANCE, ICICI
Categories: general

Summary:
ICICI Securities is bullish on HDFC Life Insurance Company has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 739 in its research report dated April 21, 2024.

Sentiment: positive
